Key Match Events: Infielder Lenyn Sosa got hit in the face with a ball before the top of the eighth inning.
Andrew Vaughn was robbed of a walk-off home run in the bottom of the ninth inning by Travis Jankowski.
Travis Jankowski made a leaping catch at the wall to save the game for the Rangers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2024 season has been historically bad for the White Sox, with the team suffering its 103rd loss of the season.
Chicago is on pace to lose 124 games, potentially surpassing the 1962 Mets for most losses in a single MLB season.
